alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 11:58PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Price County through 1215 AM CDT... At 1157 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prentice, or 25 miles north of Medford, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogema, Prentice, Spirit, and Brantwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
